quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), Ministry of Health & Family Welfare has launched the Sarva Dawa Sevan or Mass Drug Administration (MDA) campaign. It has been launched in high burden districts in ten focus states. Which of the following is not one of the ten focus states?
options: West Bengal
Karnataka
Haryana
Odisha
Bihar

quiz.text: As per recent (Feb 2023) news, Health Melas will be organized on 14th of every month in 1.56 lakh Ayushman Bharat Health and Wellness under the Swastha Mann, Swastha Ghar campaign. What is the duration of Swastha Mann, Swastha Ghar campaign?
options: Six months
Nine months
Three months
Twelve months
Eighteen months

quiz.text: As per the paragraph, eSanjeevani has registered another landmark by providing teleconsultation services to _________ (as of Feb 2023) beneficiaries.
options: 1 crore
5 crore
25 crore
50 crore
10 crore

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to eSanjeevani?

A.     It was launched in 2019.

B.      Andhra Pradesh is the top state in terms of adoption of eSanjeevani.

C.      It aims to provide specialized healthcare services through audio and video in urban areas only.
options: A and B
B and C
A and C
C only
A, B and C

quiz.text:
Recently (Feb 2023), the annual meeting of the members of the River Cities Alliance (RCA): DHARA 2023 has been organized in Pune, Maharashtra. Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to RCA?

A.     It was launched in 2021 with 100 cities as its member.

B.      It was launched by Ministry of Jal Shakti along with Ministry of Finance.

C.      It focuses on five broad themes.
options: A and B
B and C
B only
A and C
A, B and C

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), Global Biofuel alliance has been launched by India during India Energy Week 2023. Which of the following is not one of the key stakeholders of the alliance?
options: United States
Brazil
International Energy Agency
United Kingdom
Indian Sugar Mills Association

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), the first SARAS AAJEEVIKA MELA for the year 2023 was organized at Noida, Uttar Pradesh. The Government of India has set a target to achieve ________ SHG members by 2024.
options: 10 Crore
20 Crore
1 crore
50 Crore
25 Crore

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to Nasha Mukt Bharat Abhiyaan? A. Ministry of Health and Family Welfare is the nodal ministry. B. It was initially launched in 272 districts. C. All the de-addiction facilities have been geo-tagged.
options: A and B
B and C
A and C
C only
A, B and C

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), the Union Ministry of Tourism has organized the first G20 Tourism Working Group Meeting in Rann of Kutch, Gujarat. Which of the following is/are the Priority Areas in the Tourism Sector during India’s G-20 Presidency?
options: Green Tourism
Digitalization
Tourism MSMEs
Destination Management
All of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), the G20 Alliance for the Empowerment and Progression of Women’s Economic Representation (EMPOWER) Inception Meeting has been held. Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to the G20 EMPOWER Inception meeting?
options: The meeting was held in Agra, Uttar Pradesh.
Theme of the meeting was ‘Empowering Women to Lead Across Sectors: Role of Digital Skilling and Future Skills’.
Ministry of Women and Child Development is the nodal ministry of G20 EMPOWER.
2 and 3
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Indian G20 Presidency, in collaboration with ________, will be publishing the 5th report on actions against marine plastic litter under the G20 Framework for Marine Plastic Litter.
options: Japan
Australia
Singapore
Israel
United Kingdom

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), the inaugural City Sherpa Meeting of the 2023 Urban 20 (U20) Engagement Group /6th U20 Cycle has been held. Which of the following is the chair city for U20 2023?
options: Indore
New Delhi
Bengaluru
Chennai
Ahmedabad

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), the 3rd Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN) Digital Ministers (ADGMIN) meeting with India has been held virtually. Which of the following countries currently has Chairmanship of ASEAN 2023?
options: Indonesia
Brunei
Cambodia
Vietnam
Thailand

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), the Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY) has organized the1st Meeting of G20 Digital Economy Working Group (DEWG) in Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh. Which of the following organizations has/have not been invited to the meeting?
options: UNDP
UNEP
OECD
World Bank
UNESCO

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), the 1st International conference on Communication, Electronics and Digital Technologies (NICE DT 2023) has been organized by the __________ in New Delhi.
options: Telecom Regulatory Authority of India
Ministry of Communications
National Informatics Centre
National Institute of Electronics and Information Technology
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), the Ministry of Defence has informed about the production and initiatives for self-reliance in Defence manufacturing. Government of India is targeting defence manufacturing worth _____________ including defence exports of Rs. 35,000 Crore by the year 2024-25.
options: Rs. 2,25,000 Crore
Rs. 75,000 Crore
Rs. 1,75,000 Crore
Rs. 1,50,000 Crore
Rs. 1,25,000 Crore

quiz.text: National Industrial Corridor Development and Implementation Trust (NICDIT) is under the aegis of which of the following ministries?
options: Ministry of Commerce and Industry
Ministry of Road Transport and Highways of India
Ministry of Heavy Industries
Ministry of Petroleum and Natural Gas
Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs

quiz.text: Index of Eight Core industries (ICI) released by Office of Economic Advisor (OEA), Department of Industrial Policy and promotion, comprises _________ of weight of items included in the Index of Industrial Production (IIP).
options: 35.27%
40.27%
50.27%
60.27%
45.27%

quiz.text: Which of the following key provisions of Occupational Safety, Heath and Working Conditions (OSH) Code, 2020 is/are incorrectly mentioned?
options: Only one registration for one establishment.
Appointment letter made statutory.
Free of cost annual health checks-up for employees.
Women permitted to work in night shifts, after their prior consent.
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), as per the data shared by National Association of Software and services Companies (NASSOM), total amount of IT export from the county during FY 2021-22 was __________.
options: USD 178 Billion
USD 278 Billion
USD 151 Billion
USD 150 Billion
USD 224 Billion

quiz.text: IT sector contributes _________ to the GDP of India.
options: 17.6%
10.2%
7.4%
6.8%
9.4%

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), Indian Railways and Indian Post have formally launched Rail Post Gati Shakti Express Cargo Services. Which of the following features of the cargo services is/are incorrect?
options: For the first-time tariff on the basis of per Kg of the goods per kilometre has been determined.
Door-step pick-up and delivery.
Flexibility of Quantum of Load.
Insurance (at 1% of cargo value).
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), the Union Minister for Tourism launched the ‘Best Tourism Village Competition Portal’ and ‘Rural Tourism Portal’. As per the minister, the target is to make India __________ tourism economy by 2047 with 100 million international visitors.
options: USD 100 billion
USD 2 trillion
USD 500 billion
USD 1 trillion
USD 750 billion

quiz.text:
Which of the following ministries has inaugurated the Mission Antyodaya Survey (MAS)

2022-23 including launching of its portal and mobile application?
options: Ministry of Consumer Affairs, Food and Public Distribution
Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
Ministry of Rural Development
Ministry of Tribal Affairs
Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment

quiz.text: As per recent (Feb 2023) news, thousands of Amrit Sarovars have been dedicated to the country in a short span of Nine months. Government had a target of completing 60% of _________ Sarovars by 15th August 2023.
options: 50,000
20,000
100,000
75,000
None of the above
